attributes.action: support an idea for the webcats on the webchats ... add a "suggestions box" to cabinet profiles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petitioner is calling for the P.M. to add an "ideas" suggestions box or "your think - tank ideas for the, say, environment ... the economy ... the health service - linked to each of the communiques headed by Sec. of State. Involving more people than a policy unit ! My idea will also add some continuity amidst reshuffles and promotions etc.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
